sentences.en: A fast pulse and restlessness are early signs of oxygen deprivation.
sentences.cn: 脉搏增快和烦躁是缺氧的早期征兆.

sentences.en: A singular restlessness had driven him to her door.
sentences.cn: 纯粹是由于一种坐立不安的焦躁情绪驱使他来到她门前.

sentences.en: A terrible restlessness that was like to hunger afflicted Martin Eden.
sentences.cn: 一阵可怕的、跟饥饿差不多的不安情绪折磨着马丁·伊登.

sentences.en: An emotional state characterized by anxiety , depression, and restlessness.
sentences.cn: 以焦虑 、 悲观和不安为特征的情绪状态.

sentences.en: But there always was dissatisfied restlessness under the placid surface to life.
sentences.cn: 但是在表面平静的生活下面一直有一种不满和不安的情绪.

sentences.en: Davidson's restlessness was intolerable even to himself. But he was buoyed up by a wonderful exhilaration.
sentences.cn: 戴维逊坐立不安,连他自己都感到无法忍受. 但是一种奇特的兴奋情绪支撑着他.

sentences.en: From the audience came increasing sounds of restlessness.
sentences.cn: 观众不满的呼声越来越高。

sentences.en: He was afflicted always with a gnawing restlessness.
sentences.cn: 他老是被一种叫人苦恼的不安情绪折磨着.

sentences.en: His was the solitude, self - doubt and restlessness of dislocation and displacement.
sentences.cn: 他独自一人 、 自我 怀疑,心里不断地崩溃错位.

sentences.en: It was the almost furtive restlessness and irritability that had possessed him.
sentences.cn: 那是一种一直纠缠着他的隐秘的不安和烦恼.

sentences.en: Restlessness, anxiety , confusion, and twitching may also precede convulsions.
sentences.cn: 惊厥前也可出现躁动,烦燥, 错觉, 抽搐等症状.

sentences.en: Restlessness: You're prone to error. Think before you act.
sentences.cn: 不宁: 你倾向于过失, 行动前先考虑考虑.

sentences.en: Their gossips abraded her into restlessness.
sentences.cn: 他们的流言蜚语使她心烦意乱.

sentences.en: Then came the summer, and restlessness seized these young people.
sentences.cn: 夏日来临, 这些青年人闲不住了.

sentences.en: This quality was continually breaking through his punctilious manner in the shape of restlessness.
sentences.cn: 这个特点不断地以坐立不安的形式突破他那拘谨的举止而流露出来.

words.tran_cn: 宁静的；安静的；给人休息的
倔强的；难驾御的；不安宁的
焦躁不安的；不安宁的；得不到满足的
休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于

trans.tran_cn: 坐立不安，心神不定，无休止
